entities.name: fudge
entities.description: Fudge is introduced as a character who clears his throat loudly and picks up his pinstriped cloak. He is referred to as the Minister of Magic.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is introduced as a character who asks Fudge questions and tries to get permission from him.

entities.name: black
entities.description: Black is mentioned as someone that Fudge has not yet dealt with, but it's only a matter of time.

relationships.description: Fudge and Harry have a conversation about Black and permission to visit Hogsmeade.
Fudge has a connection with Black, as he mentions that it's only a matter of time before dealing with him.
